channel.title: Plant Breeding on Omer Perach

item.title: GenoSee Business Model
item.description: Executive Summary Worldwide climate change and decrease in arable lands and lands under permanent crops constitute a major concern for future food safety. Private and government based breeding programs working constantly to develop elite crops in order to meet the future demand to feed 10 billion people by 2050. Under these constraints, to meet the rising demand for food, agricultural production must increase by an estimated 50% without greatly increasing water usage or expanding the total land area dedicated to agriculture.

item.title: Analyzing Soy Field Trial
item.description: You are a plant breeder, you in the end of collecting all the data for a long and exhaustive four year project with the goal to find the crop lines with the best traits for the customers. Letâ€™s take a data set from the agridat package: The data is a field trial on 58 varieties of soybean, grown in four locations across two years in Australia.
